list.name: Status
list.query: select title,tags,text from annotations where $timeFilter and cluster = 'calico'

list.name: environment
list.query: show tag values from cpu_idle with key = environment_label

list.name: server
list.query: show tag values from process_processes with key = "hostname" where environment_label =~ /^$environment$/ and service =~ /calico/
